Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Cysteine proteinase inhibitor 1 (KCPI1; Phytocystatin; Plant defensin)
Sequence Information.Family:
Belongs to the cystatin family (Phytocystatin subfamily
)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Specific inhibitor of papain family cysteine proteinases (By similarity).
